title: Data Structure
summary: My notes on Data Structures, a foundational concept in computer science about organizing and storing data efficiently for optimal access and modification.

title: Object Oriented Programming
summary: My notes on the Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) paradigm. This covers key principles like encapsulation, inheritance, and polymorphism with practical examples.

title: Machine Learning (NLP)
summary: My notes on Natural Language Processing (NLP), a subfield of AI that enables computers to understand and process human language for tasks like sentiment analysis.
